#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int inline inp()
{
    long long int n=0,a=1;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {if(c=='-'){a=-1;}c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return a*n;
}
int main()
{
	long long int t,n,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		n=inp();
		cout<<n-1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
